cards.title: Eliza
powers: Draw 1 card. {Eliza} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Reduce damage dealt to 1 target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
One hero deals a target 1 melee damage and 1 melee damage.
One player may draw a card now.

openingLines.default: We must stop them before anymore damage is caused.

cards.title: Omnifensive Fighting
cards.body: {Eliza} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. {Eliza} reduces the next damage she would take by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Defense is just as valuable{BR}as offense. Best to be prepared{BR}to use both.

cards.title: Rapid Strikes
cards.body: {Eliza} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: I can barely follow her attacks.{BR}Just glad they're not aimed at me.

cards.title: Swift Incapacitation
cards.body: You may destroy up to 2 targets with 2 or less HP.

flavorQuotes.text: You would be surprised how often{BR}I need more than one set{BR}of manacles.

cards.title: Call For Arms
body: Search your deck or trash for a copy of Runic Rapier or Arcane Arm and add it to your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: This is why I keep backups.

cards.title: Charge The Arcane Cells
cards.body: Search your deck for an Arcane Cell. You may put it into play or your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Just put this here and...{BR}now the magic can flow.

cards.title: Arcane Arm
body: Reduce damage to this card by 1. When {Eliza} would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to this card.
Up to 3 Arcane Cells may be played next to this card at a time. If you play an Arcane Cell next to this card while 3 others are next to this card, destroy a different Arcane Cell.
When this card is destroyed, destroy all Arcane Cells next to it.

flavorQuotes.text: Even if you replace what is lost,{BR}it will never act the same. Be the same.{BR}You will always need to adapt.

cards.title: Telekinetic Cell
body: Play this card next to an Arcane Arm in play.
Increase the number of Runic Rapiers that can be in play by 1.
When this card would leave play, return a Runic Rapier in play to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Who said I only had one floating sword?

cards.title: Impact Cell
body: Play this card next to an Arcane Arm in play.
Increase the damage dealt by {Eliza} by one.
When this card would leave play, {Eliza} deals 1 target 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Careful, any more force and your weapons are likely to snap.

cards.title: Deflection Cell
body: Play this card next to an Arcane Arm in play.
Reduce the damage taken by the Arcane Arm by 1.
When this card would be leave play, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Take that!{BR}*dink*{BR}Not good, not good, not good!

cards.title: Runic Rapier
body: You may only have 1 copy of Runic Rapier in play at a time.
The first time {Eliza} deals damage each turn, she deals 1 target 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Let me guess; another batch of{BR}rapiers, no knuckle guard, no decal,{BR}and primed for an enchanter. *sigh* You know the price.

powers: {Eliza} deals up to X targets 2 melee damage where X is the number of Runic Rapiers in play.

cards.title: Deliberate Targeting
cards.body: Damage dealt by {Eliza} can't be redirected.

flavorQuotes.text: Knowing where to strike is just as important as knowing when to strike.

powers: {Eliza} deals each target 1 melee damage and destroy this card.

cards.title: Blade Flurry
body: When {Eliza} would deal damage, instead deal the target 1 damage X times where X is the damage before modifiers.
At the end of your turn, you may play a card.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Before you go on with your{BR}tough guy act, you might want to check how{BR}many times she stabbed ya.

cards.title: Capture, Not Kill
cards.body: When {Eliza} would destroy a non-Character target, instead place them on the bottom of their associated deck.

flavorQuotes.text: You will be fine.{BR}We'll get a healer to patch up your hamstrings. We just have a few questions.

promoCards.title: Eliza
powers: Destroy a Runic Rapier. If you do, destroy an ongoing or non-character device and draw a card. Otherwise, search your deck or trash for a Runic Rapier and put it into play.
flippedBody: When a hero would be reduced to zero HP or fewer, you may instead remove {Eliza} from the game to prevant that damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Destroy an Ongoing or Enviroment card.
One player may play a card.

openingLines.default: I won't give in, not to you!

promoCards.title: Eliza
powers: If Arcane Arm is in play, Arcane Arm deals Eliza 2 radiant damage that can't be redirected and Arcane Arm regains 3 HP. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may use a power.
One hero deals 1 target 2 radiant damage.

openingLines.default: Divinity couldn't get past me, what makes you different?
